name: Touchdown Run Lite
description:
The most addicting football game on iPhone!

Your job is to take the football and dash between defenders until you score a touchdown. Make sure to read the holes in the defense and keep the pedal to the metal!

WHAT THEY ARE SAYING:

"great game simple fun easy. Its a great game" - raven100403

"Lots of fun. my high score is 84 so far. Really fun. Great idea for a game." - Zman2596

"The game is incredibly simple, but it's oddly addicting. I love the how when you lose your player is on the ground. Somehow good to play before a real game. It makes you think you can make it all the way in the real world too" - James Thornock
